topic.title: How to purchase a game ?
topic.shortdesc: Here im going to show you how to purchase you'r favorite games.

body.p: Prerequisites : You need to download the Steam client first before you can purchase you'r favorite game. Here is the link from where you can dowload it.

ol.li: Start you'r Steam application from you'r executable file.
Then go to the "search tab" and add the title of the game that you want to search.
After you add you'r game title It will show you the result of your search.
Then you can browse and click the "product" that you wish to inspect.It will show you a detail screen of the game.
After you decide that you want to purchase this "product" you can click the "Add to Cart" button.
Then it will ask you if you'r purchasing it for "youtself" or for a "friend"
After you choose one of thoese options and then it will show you the "payment information".

And finally after you fill the information needed, click the "Continue" button to complete the purchase.
Result : After you completed all the steps, the purchase should be complete.
